hanzi-su-wiki:
欺

Значения

Обманывать; не уступать в чём-либо; напоминать что-либо

Мнемоника

Нехватка воздуха 欠, негодование от контакта с варварами — теми 其, некитайцами.
purpleculture_pinyin:
qī
to take unfair advantage of; to deceive; to cheat
использовать несправедливое преимущество; обмануть; обманывать
rtega_mnemonic:
欺欺RScheat, double-cross, deceive
  • man with open mouth 欠 at the table 其 deceiving everyone
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 其 indicates the sound; 欠 (lack) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
欺骗 [ qī piàn ]: to deceive; to cheat
欺诈 [ qī zhà ]: to cheat
欺侮 [ qī wǔ ]: to bully
欺压 [ qī yā ]: to bully; to push around
欺凌 [ qī líng ]: to bully and humiliate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 其 [ qí ] his, her, its, their; that
    • 欠 [ qiàn ] to lack, to owe; to breathe, to yawn
heisig_chinese_memo: Kasparov practices his dupe skills by grabbing your rook while pretending to yawn.
heisig_constituent: deceit, bushel basket, hamper, animal legs, eight, lack, yawn
koohiiStory1: He escaped using deceit. That is, he ran past while the guard was yawning and hid in the bushel basket.
koohiiStory2: Every day, a smuggler takes bushel baskets on donkeys across the border. But the border patrols can never arrest him for lack of evidence no matter how much they search the bushel baskets: they can´t find whatever he is smuggling. What was his deceit? He was smuggling donkeys!
jp_example_words:
欺く(あざむく): to deceive
詐欺(さぎ): fraud, swindle
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A crab will try to hide what it lacks with deceit. Lying, stealing, faking things—no type of deceit is too much for a crab.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Covering things up with deceit is pretty much the worst thing you can do, so don't be like this crab.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Deceit can only take you so far, and soon the crab is caught, tried for its crimes and coverups, and sentenced to death via guillotine (ぎ).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the crab with its head, er, front half? Whatever, it's in the guillotine and it's screaming, "You've been deceived! I never deceived anyone, you're all sheep!"
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if that (其) is lacking (欠) you may have to deceive
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Kasparov practices his dupe skills by grabbing your rook while pretending to yawn.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " ow " to " its " sound. The original meaning is fraud and deception. "Said Wen": "Deception, deception. From owe to its voice." Duan Yucai changed to "deception, deception". His note: "Da Xu wrote "Fraud," and now it is based on "Yunhui". ." Such as "The Analects. "Zihan": "Who am I deceiving? Deceiving the heavens!" "Qin Ceyi": "Su Qin deceives the widowed, and wants to use the wisdom of one person to overturn the king of the East Mountain, and then deceive Qin." Bao Biao's note: "Deception, deception."

The extension of " bully " means bullying and bullying. Such as the Western Han Dynasty Jia Yi "New Book. "Jiexian": "The scouts looked at Fengsui and did not dare to lie down. They would slept with the attackers or were slain, while the Huns were bullied and invaded, and they didn't know where to live." Tang Dynasty Cui Hao "General Huo": "Mo Yan is poor and humble. Can be deceived, life is rich and rich."

" Deception " also means overwhelming and surpassing. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Mu's "Zhang Haohao Poetry": "Piaoran collects cyclists, satire and deceives each other." In the Tang Dynasty, Qiu was "Zuoye Lihua": "The cold and beautiful all cheating on the snow, and the lingering fragrance enters the clothes." Chapter 88: "There are a few bottles of fragrant glutinous veggie wine, pour out, and match the fruit juice; offer a few Yangxian immortal teas, hold them in your hands, fragrant and deceive Dangui."
humanum_short_description_en: From " ow " to " its " sound. The original meaning is fraud and deception.
humanum_full_description:
從「欠」，「其」聲。本義是欺詐、欺騙。《說文》：「欺，詐欺也。从欠，其聲。」段玉裁改為「欺，詐也」，其注云：「大徐作『詐欺也』，今依《韵會》正。」如《論語．子罕》：「吾誰欺？欺天乎！」《戰國策．秦策一》：「蘇秦欺寡人，欲以一人之智，反覆東山之君，從以欺秦。」鮑彪注：「欺，詐也。」

　　「欺」引申表示欺負、欺凌。如西漢賈誼《新書．解縣》：「斥候者望烽燧而不敢臥，將吏戍者或被介冑而睡，而匈奴欺侮侵掠，未知息時於焉。」唐代崔顥〈霍將軍〉：「莫言貧賤即可欺，人生富貴自有時。」

　　「欺」也表示壓倒、勝過。如唐代杜牧〈張好好詩〉：「飄然集仙客，諷賦欺相如。」又唐代丘為〈左掖梨花〉：「冷豔全欺雪，餘香乍入衣。」《西遊記》第88回：「有幾瓶香糯素酒，斟出來，賽過瓊漿；獻幾番陽羡仙茶，捧到手，香欺丹桂。」
humanum_short_description: 從「欠」，「其」聲。本義是欺詐、欺騙。

欺く(あざむく): to deceive
詐欺(さぎ): fraud, swindle

從「 欠 」，「 其 」聲。本義是欺詐、欺騙。《說文》：「欺，詐欺也。从欠，其聲。」段玉裁改為「欺，詐也」，其注云：「大徐作『詐欺也』，今依《韵會》正。」如《論語．子罕》：「吾誰欺？欺天乎！」《戰國策．秦策一》：「蘇秦欺寡人，欲以一人之智，反覆東山之君，從以欺秦。」鮑彪注：「欺，詐也。」 「 欺 」引申表示欺負、欺凌。如西漢賈誼《新書．解縣》：「斥候者望烽燧而不敢臥，將吏戍者或被介冑而睡，而匈奴欺侮侵掠，未知息時於焉。」唐代崔顥〈霍將軍〉：「莫言貧賤即可欺，人生富貴自有時。」 「 欺 」也表示壓倒、勝過。如唐代杜牧〈張好好詩〉：「飄然集仙客，諷賦欺相如。」又唐代丘為〈左掖梨花〉：「冷豔全欺雪，餘香乍入衣。」《西遊記》第88回：「有幾瓶香糯素酒，斟出來，賽過瓊漿；獻幾番陽羡仙茶，捧到手，香欺丹桂。」

His note: "Da Xu wrote "Fraud," and now it is based on "Yunhui". ." Such as "The Analects. "Zihan": "Who am I deceiving? Deceiving the heavens!" "Qin Ceyi": "Su Qin deceives the widowed, and wants to use the wisdom of one person to overturn the king of the East Mountain, and then deceive Qin." Bao Biao's note: "Deception, deception." The extension of " bully" means bullying and bullying. Such as the Western Han Dynasty Jia Yi "New Book. "Jiexian": "The scouts looked at Fengsui and did not dare to lie down. They would slept with the attackers or were slain, while the Huns were bullied and invaded, and they didn't know where to live." Tang Dynasty Cui Hao "General Huo": "Mo Yan is poor and humble. Can be deceived, life is rich and rich." " Deception" also means overwhelming and surpassing. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Mu's "Zhang Haohao Poetry": "Piaoran collects cyclists, satire and deceives each other." In the Tang Dynasty, Qiu was "Zuoye Lihua": "The cold and beautiful all cheating on the snow, and the lingering fragrance enters the clothes." Chapter 88: "There are a few bottles of fragrant glutinous veggie wine, pour out, and match the fruit juice; offer a few Yangxian immortal teas, hold them in your hands, fragrant and deceive Dangui."

欺字的基本解释

欺
qī
诈骗，蒙混：欺骗。欺诈。欺哄。欺瞒。欺诬。欺诳。欺蒙。童叟无欺。
压迫，侮辱：欺负。欺侮。欺压。欺凌。欺生。欺善怕恶。

欺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》去其切，平之，溪。］
(1)欺骗；欺诈。
(2)遮蔽。
(3)辜负。
(4)欺负；凌侮。
(5)压倒；胜过。
(6)超过。
(7)丑貌。参见“欺”。

欺字的英文翻译

◎ 欺
bully, deceive

欺字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　欺； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页568第14
【唐韻】去其切【集韻】【韻會】丘其切，?音僛。【說文】詐欺也。【新書·道術篇】仁義修立謂之任，反任爲欺。【論語】吾誰欺。【史記·循吏傳】子產治鄭，民不能欺。子賤治單父，民不忍欺。西門豹治鄴，民不敢欺。　又自昧其心曰欺。【大學】毋自欺也。【蘇洵曰】書有以加乎其言，言有以加乎其心，聖人以爲自欺。【呂祖謙論鄭莊公殺叔段曰】將欲欺人，必先欺心。　又欺，㨆也。【揚子·方言】晉、魏、河內之北謂㨆曰殘，楚謂之貪，南楚江、湘之閒謂之欺。【郭註】言欺㨆難厭也。今關西人呼打爲㨆，音廩，或洛感反。　又詆欺，漢法名。漢有誹謗詆欺法，至哀帝始除之。　又謾也，陵也。【李翊·俗呼小錄】見陵於人爲欺負。　又欺?，大首也。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】仡欺?以雕?。【註】欺?，大首也。雕?，如雕之視也。?與瞲同。　【集韻】或作倛。

欺字的源字形

欺字的起名意思

暂无。

bully
qī
Fraud, confuse: deceive. Fraud. deceive. fool. Deceive. Deceive. defraud. The young man is not deceived.
Oppression, insult: bullying. bully. Oppress. Bullying. cheat strangers. Deceive good and fear evil.
bully

[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" go to Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xi. ]
(1) Deception; fraud.
(2) Shading.
(3) Let down.
(4) Bullying; bullying.
(5) Overwhelming; surpassing.
(6) Exceed.
(7) Ugly appearance. See "deception".

There were slander and slander in the Han Dynasty, and the emperor Ai first eliminated it.　 Ye Ye, Ling Ye. [Li Yi·Shu Hu Xiaolu] Seeing Ling Yu was bullied.　Bullying again? The big head too. Name meaning
Nothing.
形声字。欠表意,古文字形体像人张口呼气,表示张口欺骗他人;其(q)表声,其是指示代词,指代被欺骗的人。本义
是欺骗。
①欺骗;蒙骗:~瞒」自~~人「童叟无~。②欺负;压
迫:~侮」~软怕硬「~人太甚。
~负 ~凌 ~蒙 ~骗 ~辱~生 ~压~诈
~行霸市 ~世盗名 自~ 購上~下 仗势~人
欺
qī
慧欺欺
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Недопредставление, древние иероглифы напоминают человека, открывающего рты для выдоха, что означает открытие рта, чтобы обмануть других; его (q) представляет звук, которое является указательным местоимением, которое относится к обманутому человеку.
Первоначальный смысл - обман.
① Обманывать, обманывать: ~ Чтобы прятаться от ~ ~ люди - это «дети».
②Буллинг; притеснение: ~ Оскорбление "~ мягкое и страшное" ~ слишком много людей.
~ Негатив ~ Лин ~ Мэн ~ Чит ~ Оскорбление ~ Здоровье ~ Пресса ~ Мошенничество
~ Город Синба ~ Имя воров из мира ~ Buy Up ~ Down Battle ~ Люди
терроризировать
Хуэй Ли Ли
Кай
qī
гл.
1) обманывать; дурачить, надувать
自欺欺人 обманывать себя и других
童叟无欺 здесь не обманут ни ребёнка, ни старика (реклама в лавке)
2) оскорблять, обижать, третировать
仗势欺人 пользуясь большим влиянием, третировать людей
不要欺人太甚 не следует обижать людей так сильно
Radicals: 其, 欠  (crab, lack)
Meaning Mnemonic
A crab will try to hide what it lacks with deceit. Lying, stealing, faking things—no type of deceit is too much for a crab.
Covering things up with deceit is pretty much the worst thing you can do, so don't be like this crab.
Reading Mnemonic
Deceit can only take you so far, and soon the crab is caught, tried for its crimes and coverups, and sentenced to death via guillotine (ぎ).
Picture the crab with its head, er, front half? Whatever, it's in the guillotine and it's screaming, "You've been deceived! I never deceived anyone, you're all sheep!"
